examples.example: 每次见到许久未见的朋友，我都特别开心。

translate.english: Every time I see a friend I haven't seen for a long time, I am extremely happy.

examples.example: 每次见到老师，我都会礼貌地打招呼。

translate.english: Every time I see the teacher, I will greet politely.

examples.example: 每次见到阳光灿烂的日子，我的心情就会格外舒畅。

translate.english: Every time I see a sunny day, my mood will be exceptionally comfortable.
